rule.name: Defenders of Humanity
rule.description: A unit with this ability that is within range of an objective marker (as specified in the mission) controls the objective marker even if there are more enemy models within range of that objective marker. If an enemy unit within range of the same objective marker has a similar ability, then the objective marker is controlled by the player who has the most models within range of it as normal.

rule.name: Grim Resolve
rule.description: You can re-roll all hit rolls of 1 for this unit whenever it shoots (including when firing Overwatch) so long as it did not move in its prior Movement phase. In addition, this unit can never lose more than one model as the result of any single failed morale test.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Before any models are deployed at the start of the game, this unit when containing its maximum number of models, may be split into two units each containing an equal number of models.

rule.name: And They Shall Know No Fear
rule.description: You can re-roll failed Morale tests for this unit.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: On a hit roll of 1, the bearer is slain after all of this weapon's shots have been resolved.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Before any models are deployed at the start of the game, this unit when containing its maximum number of models, may be split into two units each containing an equal number of models.

rule.name: And They Shall Know No Fear
rule.description: You can re-roll failed Morale tests for this unit.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Before this unit shoots in the Shooting phase, you can choose one model from this unit that is within 3" of its Sergeant; you can add 1 to hit rolls made for your chosen model's weapons this phase.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Enemy units do not gain any bonuses to their saving throws for being in cover against shooting attacks made by friendly RAVENWINGunits that are within 6" of this model.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for friendly DARK ANGELSunits within 6" of this model.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: If this unit Advances, it gains a 4+ invulnerable save against all shooting attacks until the start of your next Movement phase.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: If a model in this unit is reduced to 0 wounds, roll a D6 before removing the model from the battlefield; on a 6 it explodes, and each unit within 3" suffer a mortal wounds.

rule.name: And They Shall Know No Fear
rule.description: You can re-roll failed Morale tests for this unit.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: Each time the bearer fights, it can make one additional attack with this weapon.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Enemy units within 3" of the bearer must subtract 1 from their Leadership characteristic. In addition, enemy CHARACTERSthat start the Fight phase within 3" of the bearer can only be chosen to fight after all other eligible units have made their attacks, even if they charged or have an ability that would allow them to fight first.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: This model has a 4+ invulnerable save.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 made for friendly <CHAPTER> units within 6" of this model.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: If a model in this unit is reduced to 0 wounds, roll a D6 before removing the model from the battlefield; on a 6 it explodes, and each unit within 3" suffer a mortal wounds.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: If this unit Advances, it gains a 4+ invulnerable save against all shooting attacks until the start of your next Movement phase.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: You can re-roll failed hit rolls for friendly RAVENWING units within 6" of this model.

rule.name: And They Shall Know No Fear
rule.description: You can re-roll failed Morale tests for this unit.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: This weapon has Strength x 2 if Sammael charged in the preceding Charge phase.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: You can re-roll failed hit rolls for <DARK ANGELS> units within 6" of Azrael.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: If your army is battle-forged, you receive one additional command point if Azrael is your warlord.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Azrael is accompanied by a relic bearer who carries the Lion Helm, an artefact that generates a powerful force field. As a result, all friendly DARK ANGELS INFANTRY and DARK ANGELS BIKERmodels within 6" of Azrael have a 4+ invulnerable save. The relic bearer model must always remain as close to Azrael as possible, but is otherwise ignored for all gaming purposes. Remove the relic bearer if Azrael is slain.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: This unit automatically passes Morale tests. In addition, you can re-roll failed hit rolls in the Fight phase for attacks by this unit that target a FALLEN unit.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: Each time you make a wound roll of 6+, the target suffers a mortal wound in addition to any other damage.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: When attacking with this weapon, choose one or both of the profiles. If you choose both, subtract 1 from the hit roll for this weapon.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: This weapon can be supercharged by the bearer before firing. If they do so, increase the strength and damage of this weapon by 1 for this turn. On any hit rolls of 1 when firing supercharge, the bearer is slain after all the weapon's shots have been resolved.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Your opponent must subtract 1 from any hit rolls they make for shooting attacks that target friendly <CHAPTER> units within 6" of any friendly Ravenwing Darkshrouds.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: If this unit Advances, it gains a 4+ invulnerable save against all shooting attacks until the start of your next Movement phase.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: If a model in this unit is reduced to 0 wounds, roll a D6 before removing the model from the battlefield; on a 6 it explodes, and each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Before this model moves in your Movement phase, you can declare it will hover. It's Movement characteristic becomes 20" until the end of the phase and it looses Airborne, Hard to Hit and Supersonic abilities until the beginning of your next Movement phase.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Once per game, this model can drop a stasis bomb as it flies over an enemy unit in its Movement phase. After the Ravenwing Dark Talon has moved, pick one enemy unit that it flew over. Then, roll a d6 for each model in the enemy unit (up to a maximum of 10 dice). For each roll of a 4+, the target unit suffers a mortal wound.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: If this unit Advances, it gains a 4+ invulnerable save against all shooting attacks until the start of your next Movement phase.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: You can add 1 to hit rolls for this model when targeting an enemy in the Shooting phase that cannot FLY.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Your opponent must subtract 1 from to hit rolls for attacks that target this model in the Shooting phase.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: This model cannot charge, and can only be charged by units that FLY, and can only attacked or be attacked in the Fight phase by units that can FLY.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: If this model is reduced to 0 wounds, roll a d6 before removing this model from the battlefield; on a 6 it crashes and explodes, and each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Each time this model moves, first pivot it on the spot up to 90Â° (this does not contribute to how far the model moves), and then move the model straight forwards. Note that it cannot pivot again after the initial pivot. When this model Advances, increase its Move characteristic by 20" until the end of the phase - do not roll a dice.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: If a unit suffers any damage from this weapon, roll a dice and consult the damage table. If the result equals or beats the number in the rift vortex column, the target suffers an additional D3 mortal wounds.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Before any models are deployed at the start of the game, this unit when containing its maximum number of models, may be split into two units each containing an equal number of models.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: When you set up this unit during deployment, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" from the enemy deployment zone and any enemy models.

rule.name: And They Shall Know No Fear
rule.description: You can re-roll failed Morale tests for this unit.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: If the target is within half range, add 1 to this weapon's Strength.
